features.1: Updated theme to be Wilson Wolf colors and logo.
Added softmax of 6 for y axis and 8 for x axis.
features.2: Added functionality to hide the software update feature if not available.
features.3: Added gridlines to frequency and signal check figures.
features.4: Set figure ticks to integer values only.
features.5: Added a label to help identify the widget the keyboard is tied to.
features.6: Updated keyboard to contain more symbols, more efficiently.

features.1: Added scroll to button/scroll top top buttons to release notes window.
Updated to work with updated manufacturing dashboard foldering
Added back message when readers successfully sweep
features.2: Changed color of start/stop buttons to green/red, respectively
features.4: Moved user authentication to before the setup reader screen.
features.5: Added an admin setting to change the device ID
features.7: Removed autogenerated ID from title until after setup is submitted.

bugfixes.1: Fixed software update functionality and messaging.
Fixed bug with run export destination location.
